## SaturateNode class

Clamps a value to the range \[0, 1\]

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class SaturateNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns clamp(x, 0, 1). Commonly used to ensure color values are in valid range. Supports float, vec2, vec3, and vec4 inputs. Component-wise for vectors.
